conversations.body_text: Hello the Order number is Not activate. -- Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 24.12.25, 11:08 schrieb SIMSONN
Hi ricardo schumacher,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.
